sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SHEPPEY, an iſland at the mouth of the river Medway, about 20 miles in circumference. It is ſeparated from the main land by a narrow channel, and has a fertile soil, which feeds great flocks of ſheep. The borough-town of Queenborough is ſeated thereon ; beſides which it has several villages.
